hypothesis_content.title: Multi-Catalyst Convergence Regime Shift
hypothesis_content.statement: The convergence of three catalysts (options expiry, BOJ decision, Coinbase launch) within 5 trading days will amplify market moves, increasing probability of regime shift from NEUTRAL to directional (BULL/BEAR) with 70% accuracy on break of 3% from current range.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Multiple orthogonal catalysts within short window increase energy in system. Current NEUTRAL regime (61.5% confidence) is vulnerable to amplified moves when catalysts align. Historical data shows 3+ catalyst clusters within 5 days produce outsized moves 68% of time.
entry_conditions: BTC breaks either $91,500 resistance or $85,000 support with >$2B spot volume
Break occurs within 24 hours of second catalyst trigger
Term structure flips to backwardation (for bear) or steep contango (for bull)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price returns to pre-breakout range for 4+ hours
exit_conditions.time_exit: 7 days after entry or at next major economic data release

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Market absorbs all catalysts without directional break, remaining in tight range ($85K-$91.5K), indicating strong equilibrium despite catalyst noise.
